title: Installing truffle on Mac
body:
---------------------------

## Issue

Not able to install Truffle on mac os 10.9

## Steps to Reproduce

npm install truffle -g

or

npm install truffle@3.2.1 -g
npm install truffle@3.2.2 -g

## Expected Behavior

Installation completed.

## Actual Results

* Truffle version: latest and 3.2.1, 3.2.2
* node version: 6.11.10
* npm version: 3.10.10

I've tried even with:
* node version: 8.1.2
* npm version: 5.0.3

Hi there. Pleas read our recent [blog post](http://truffleframework.com/blog/how-were-making-installation-issues-a-thing-of-the-past). We've fixed these issues in `beta`. 
http://truffleframework.com/blog/how-were-making-installation-issues-a-thing-of-the-past

Nice work devs! 
No errors, I did "truffle init" and I got the commands and the doc, so it seems working!

" And for most users, this sucks: getting hung up on installation is incredibly frustrating when you're usually just one error message or two away from creating your first Ethereum-enabled application. "

I totally agree!!!

PS: 
For me, even after "npm uninstall -g truffle", there were remnant of past installation, giving me this error:

```
$ npm install -g truffle@beta
npm ERR! Darwin 13.3.0
npm ERR! argv "/usr/local/bin/node" "/usr/local/bin/npm" "install" "-g" "truffle@beta"
npm ERR! node v6.11.0
npm ERR! npm  v3.10.10
npm ERR! path /usr/local/bin/truffle
npm ERR! code EEXIST

npm ERR! Refusing to delete /usr/local/bin/truffle: ../lib/node_modules/truffle/cli.js symlink target is not controlled by npm /usr/local
npm ERR! File exists: /usr/local/bin/truffle
npm ERR! Move it away, and try again.

npm ERR! Please include the following file with any support request:
npm ERR!     /Users/lorenzo/npm-debug.log
```

I solved by manually trashing some truffle files in the usr/bin folder.
